alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:24AM PST until February 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of an inch or less in the valleys and 2 to 5 inches for the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds are expected to hold into evening for these areas with patchy blowing/drifting snow likely be present as well. Look for significantly reduce visibility and icy road conditions to continue and create hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
